text: Mariette Hartley (born June 21 1940 in Weston, Connecticut) is an American movie and television actress. She acted in the television drama Channing. She also acted in many other TV programs and movies. Hartley won an Emmy Award. ==References== Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1940 births Category:Living people
title: Mariette Hartley
